metadata.synopsis: Repeated AD of a Steel Watcher after being SUNFLASHED. Indicates a broken status: it can't scan player for crimes against Absolute.

0.text: This unit is damaged, citizen. This unit is damaged, citizen. This unit is damaged, citizen.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Steel Watcher is no longer deactivated, but it's lost connection to hivemind forever.NodeContext: glitching, clearly damaged
